page.title: 13Funday June 29th 1985.
page.content: Shipbourne School's Funday is an annual event to raise money for the P.T.A. Every family helps to arrange their stalls or games.These are some of the stalls:toys,handicraft,white elephant,plants,tombola and lucky dip but there are many more.Funday starts at 2.00 p.m.but many people come to prepare in the morning,and finishes at 5.00 p.m. If you are very hot you can go into the stocks and get soaked with wet sponges that will definitely cool you off.This year the children's tombola was fantastic with a football and all sorts of super things.The day ended with a lighthearted tug of war which involes as many adults and children as possible,everyone had to be quite strong to give an extremely good tug.On an enjoyable afternoon,we managed to raise Â£1,000. Simon
